overview: This comedy sequel sees the 3 frat boys back and enjoying life at Christmas. Everything is quiet and peaceful when old memories are stirred back into the house. Guy and Melvin start planning a scheme on Justin for revenge that escalates into a war. Witness the beginning, and the end, of whatâ€™s now known as the frat war.
tagline: Peace is a virtue in a frat house
title: Frat House 2
